subject: T60 and i8xx_tco
body:
Hi,

during booting I get a msg

FATAL: Error inserting i8xx_tco no such device

I don't think I need the watchdog and would like to prevent kernel of 
trying to load it. It is already blacklisted in 
/etc/modprobe.de/blacklist and put as skip in /etc/discover.conf, but 
that doesn't help.
Can I do this in any other way than recompiling the kernel?
I'm running lenny with 2.6.18-4!

Thanks

Kemal


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-laptop-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
